about_the_game:
[h2] Game Description: [/h2]

In the game "American Liberty Warrior", players will take on the role of an evil American warrior who slaughters on various unjust battlefields, but eventually falls under the scythe and hammer of the justice communist power.

 

[h2] Gameplay:[/h2]

The core gameplay and various texts in the game will try to expose the true face of Israel, American imperialism, capitalism, and neoliberalism. To fit the theme, "American Liberty Warrior" revamped the gameplay of "Vampire Survivors".

 

For example:

Players will find that their weapons need to be continuously invested by the " Patron" in the game;

Players will encounter enemies who are trying to flee from them -- It shows the ordinary people of those countries that have been invaded and destroyed by the United States and the West;

Players will find that some of the enemies have become partners under the effect of the "brainwashing" skill;

Players will find that the "mobile phone" used by the enemy will turn into a bomb;

After the American Liberty Warrior commits a lot of crimes, the justice communist fighter rise from the pool of blood to deliver the final blow to the Player-controlled characters.

 

 

[h2] Contact [/h2]

Game Studio QQ：2822581834

Player QQ group: 696426229

 

[h2] The origin of the game[/h2]

I'm an ordinary indie game maker, and I was shocked and outraged when I saw ·the news of Aaron Bushnell's self-immolation in early March this year. Since then, I have been following the Israeli-Palestinian war and learned about the inhumane acts committed by Israel. Later, I swiped Fan Yongpeng's "Teach You How to Break Western Words" (BV1gv41137wa) video, and then came up with the idea of making a game to let more people understand the Palestinian-Israeli war, and then understand American imperialism, and understand the ugly nature of capitalism and neoliberalism. Just do it! and that's how the game came about.
detailed_description:
[h2] Game Description: [/h2]

In the game "American Liberty Warrior", players will take on the role of an evil American warrior who slaughters on various unjust battlefields, but eventually falls under the scythe and hammer of the justice communist power.

 

[h2] Gameplay:[/h2]

The core gameplay and various texts in the game will try to expose the true face of Israel, American imperialism, capitalism, and neoliberalism. To fit the theme, "American Liberty Warrior" revamped the gameplay of "Vampire Survivors".

 

For example:

Players will find that their weapons need to be continuously invested by the " Patron" in the game;

Players will encounter enemies who are trying to flee from them -- It shows the ordinary people of those countries that have been invaded and destroyed by the United States and the West;

Players will find that some of the enemies have become partners under the effect of the "brainwashing" skill;

Players will find that the "mobile phone" used by the enemy will turn into a bomb;

After the American Liberty Warrior commits a lot of crimes, the justice communist fighter rise from the pool of blood to deliver the final blow to the Player-controlled characters.

 

 

[h2] Contact [/h2]

Game Studio QQ：2822581834

Player QQ group: 696426229

 

[h2] The origin of the game[/h2]

I'm an ordinary indie game maker, and I was shocked and outraged when I saw ·the news of Aaron Bushnell's self-immolation in early March this year. Since then, I have been following the Israeli-Palestinian war and learned about the inhumane acts committed by Israel. Later, I swiped Fan Yongpeng's "Teach You How to Break Western Words" (BV1gv41137wa) video, and then came up with the idea of making a game to let more people understand the Palestinian-Israeli war, and then understand American imperialism, and understand the ugly nature of capitalism and neoliberalism. Just do it! and that's how the game came about.
name: American Liberty Warrior

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 20系及以上
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
